specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated, pick 2 friendly units within 12”, which take one wound next time they fail a morale test, and the test counts as passed instead.
specialRules.name: Pheromones
specialRules.label: Pheromones
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, pick 2 friendly units within 12”, which take one wound next time they fail a morale test, and the test counts as passed instead.

specialRules.hint: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.
specialRules.name: Psychic Barrier
specialRules.label: Psychic Barrier
specialRules.description: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated, pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get the Stealth rule next time they are shot at.
specialRules.name: Shrouding Mist
specialRules.label: Shrouding Mist
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get the Stealth rule next time they are shot at.

specialRules.hint: This unit counts as having Psychic(X), where X is the number of models in it. Only one model in the unit may cast or block spells each round.
specialRules.name: Psychic Synapse
specialRules.label: Psychic Synapse
specialRules.description: This unit counts as having Psychic(X), where X is the number of models in it. Only one model in the unit may cast or block spells each round.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this model takes a wound in melee, the attacker takes 1 hit.
specialRules.name: Acid Blood
specialRules.label: Acid Blood
specialRules.description: Whenever this model takes a wound in melee, the attacker takes 1 hit.

specialRules.hint: If this model is ever engaged in melee it is immediately killed and the enemy takes 3 hits for Spores and 9 hits for a Massive Spore. Additionally this model automatically passes all morale tests.
specialRules.name: Explosive Head
specialRules.label: Explosive Head
specialRules.description: If this model is ever engaged in melee it is immediately killed and the enemy takes 3 hits for Spores and 9 hits for a Massive Spore. Additionally this model automatically passes all morale tests.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated you may place a unit of 5 Grunts or 3 Hive Swarms fully within 6” of it.
specialRules.name: Spawn Brood
specialRules.label: Spawn Brood
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated you may place a unit of 5 Grunts or 3 Hive Swarms fully within 6” of it.

specialRules.hint: If this weapon misses you may place a unit of 3 Spores or 1 Massive Spore 12” away from the target, but the position is decided by your opponent. Note that this new unit can’t be activated on the round in which it is placed.
specialRules.name: Spores
specialRules.label: Spores
specialRules.description: If this weapon misses you may place a unit of 3 Spores or 1 Massive Spore 12” away from the target, but the position is decided by your opponent. Note that this new unit can’t be activated on the round in which it is placed.

specialRules.hint: This unit counts as having the Ambush rule and may be deployed up to 1” away from enemy units. Once the unit is deployed roll 4 dice, for each 4+ it deals 3 hits with AP(2) to one enemy unit within 3” (this may target multiple units).
specialRules.name: Surprise Attack
specialRules.label: Surprise Attack
specialRules.description: This unit counts as having the Ambush rule and may be deployed up to 1” away from enemy units. Once the unit is deployed roll 4 dice, for each 4+ it deals 3 hits with AP(2) to one enemy unit within 3” (this may target multiple units).

specialRules.hint: This model counts as having the Fear rule, and gets +4 to its Fear rolls.
specialRules.name: Terrifying
specialRules.label: Terrifying
specialRules.description: This model counts as having the Fear rule, and gets +4 to its Fear rolls.

specialRules.hint: This unit may transport up to 11 models, or use all of its capacity to carry one Carnivo-Rex, Psycho-Rex or Toxico-Rex.
specialRules.name: Transport Spore
specialRules.label: Transport Spore
specialRules.description: This unit may transport up to 11 models, or use all of its capacity to carry one Carnivo-Rex, Psycho-Rex or Toxico-Rex.

spells.name: Terror
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 its next morale test roll.

spells.name: Psychic Blast
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Infuse Life
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Shriek
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 3 automatic hits with AP(2) each.

spells.name: Animate Flora
spells.effect: Target piece of terrain within 6” may be moved by up to 6” in any direction or may be removed from play.

spells.name: Overwhelm
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 3 automatic hits with AP(2).
